subject: Crypto News. July 31, 2025
body:
View this post on the web at https://www.cryptointegrat.com/p/crypto-news-july-31-2025

Vare Crypto News is live ft Rise, Base App, Kensei, Katana, Magma, Trump, Nuclear War, Russia
Live on YouTube:
Live on TikTok:
Please subscribe.
DeFi
Trump sent Nuclear submarines to Russia after threats from Dmitry Medvedev, former President of Russia and now Deputy Chairman of Russia’s Security Council
Magma now the largest LST on Monad
Kensei is live on Katana , launching as the chain’s core permissionless launchpad. Anyone can launch a token, graduated tokens are automatically paired with WETH on SushiSwap, and soon, Kensei yield will feed yield back into Katana vaults.
Base app, a social media app lets users earn USDC by posting content that becomes tradable digital assets. It aims to fuel a global creator economy. Now live with waitlist access
Rise built Shred API, a low latency execution layer to make crypto apps respond in real time, bringing Web2 like speed to onchain payments, trading, and gaming.
